contents:
Fox的新闻
“China could have 50 times more coronavirus cases than claimed, Trump administration official says”


支那感染人数至少是官方宣布的50倍，也就是450万感染人打底

楼上用支那的假数据来对比美国真数据的，是来搞笑的么？





新闻链接：https://www.foxnews.com/politics/china-could-have-50-times-more-coronavirus-cases-than-claimed-trump-administration-official-says
